what: Match an argument to a character vector but skip NA — arg_match0_allow_na
title: Match an argument to a character vector but skip NA — arg_match0_allow_na
text: equivalent arg_match skip NA

title: Match an argument to a character vector but skip NA — arg_match0_allow_na
code: arg_match0_allow_na(   arg,   values,   arg_nm = rlang::caller_arg(arg),   error_call = rlang::caller_env() )

title: Match an argument to a character vector but skip NA — arg_match0_allow_na
text: arg symbol referring argument accepting strings. values character vector possible values arg can take. arg_nm error_arg. error_call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

title: Match an argument to a character vector but skip NA — arg_match0_allow_na
text: string supplied arg.

what: Match an argument to a integer vector but skip NA — arg_match0_integer

text: equivalent arg_match integer vector compared skip NA.

title: Match an argument to a integer vector but skip NA — arg_match0_integer
code: arg_match0_integer(   arg,   values,   allow_na = TRUE,   arg_nm = rlang::caller_arg(arg),   error_call = rlang::caller_env() )

title: Match an argument to a integer vector but skip NA — arg_match0_integer
text: arg symbol referring argument accepting strings. values character vector possible values arg can take. allow_na Input boolean determine NA NaN allowed. Default: TRUE arg_nm error_arg. error_call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

title: Match an argument to a integer vector but skip NA — arg_match0_integer
text: integer supplied arg.

text: equivalent arg_match integer vector compared skip NA.

title: Match an argument to a TRUE or FALSE vector but skip NA — arg_match0_true_or_false
code: arg_match0_true_or_false(   arg,   allow_na = TRUE,   arg_nm = rlang::caller_arg(arg),   error_call = rlang::caller_env() )

title: Match an argument to a TRUE or FALSE vector but skip NA — arg_match0_true_or_false
text: arg symbol referring argument accepting strings. allow_na Input boolean determine NA NaN allowed. Default: TRUE arg_nm error_arg. error_call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

title: Match an argument to a TRUE or FALSE vector but skip NA — arg_match0_true_or_false
text: TRUE FALSE value supplied arg.

what: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease based 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) basic model.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
code: calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp(age, sex, chest_pain)

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
text: age Input integer indicate age patient. sex Input integer 0 1 indicate sex patient. 0 stands Female 1 stands Male chest_pain Input integer 1 3 indicate chest pain characteristics patient. 1 stands patient typical chest pain. 2 stands patient atypical chest pain. 3 stands patient non-anginal non-specific chest pain.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) basic model.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
text: predictive model based patients 18 hospitals Europe United States. 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) PTP models follows: CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) pre-test probabilities (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease model taken Tessa Genders et. al. British Medical Journal licensed CC -NC 4.0.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp
code: # 40 year old female with typical chest pain calculate_cad2_2012_basic_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = 0,     chest_pain = 1 ) #> [1] 0.0815104

what: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease based 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) clinical coronary calcium score (CCS) model.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
code: calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp(   age,   sex,   chest_pain,   has_diabetes,   has_hypertension,   has_dyslipidemia,   has_smoking_history,   coronary_calcium_score )

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
text: age Input integer indicate age patient. sex Input integer 0 1 indicate sex patient. 0 stands Female 1 stands Male chest_pain Input integer 1 3 indicate chest pain characteristics patient. 1 stands patient typical chest pain. 2 stands patient atypical chest pain. 3 stands patient non-anginal non-specific chest pain. has_diabetes Input integer 0 1 indicate patient diabetes. 0 stands diabetes. 1 stands diabetes. has_hypertension Input integer 0 1 indicate patient hypertension. 0 stands hypertension. 1 stands hypertension. has_dyslipidemia Input integer 0 1 indicate patient dyslipidemia. 0 stands dyslipidemia. 1 stands dyslipidemia. has_smoking_history Input integer 0 1 indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). 0 stands smoking history (non-smoker). 1 stands smoking history (current past smoker). coronary_calcium_score Input positive numeric indicate total coronary calcium score patient.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) clinical coronary calcium score (CCS) model.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
text: predictive model based patients 18 hospitals Europe United States. 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) PTP models follows: CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) pre-test probabilities (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease model taken Tessa Genders et. al. British Medical Journal licensed CC -NC 4.0.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical and CCS PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp
code: # 40 year old female with typical chest pain, # diabetes but no hypertension, dyslipidemia, # a non-smoker and a coronary calcium score of 0 calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ccs_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = 0,     chest_pain = 1,     has_diabetes = 1,     has_hypertension = 0,     has_dyslipidemia = 0,     has_smoking_history = 0,     coronary_calcium_score = 0  ) #> [1] 0.02575585

what: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease based 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) clinical model.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
code: calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp(   age,   sex,   chest_pain,   has_diabetes,   has_hypertension,   has_dyslipidemia,   has_smoking_history )

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
text: age Input integer indicate age patient. sex Input integer 0 1 indicate sex patient. 0 stands Female 1 stands Male chest_pain Input integer 1 3 indicate chest pain characteristics patient. 1 stands patient typical chest pain. 2 stands patient atypical chest pain. 3 stands patient non-anginal non-specific chest pain. has_diabetes Input integer 0 1 indicate patient diabetes. 0 stands diabetes. 1 stands diabetes. has_hypertension Input integer 0 1 indicate patient hypertension. 0 stands hypertension. 1 stands hypertension. has_dyslipidemia Input integer 0 1 indicate patient dyslipidemia. 0 stands dyslipidemia. 1 stands dyslipidemia. has_smoking_history Input integer 0 1 indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). 0 stands smoking history (non-smoker). 1 stands smoking history (current past smoker).

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) clinical model.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
text: predictive model based patients 18 hospitals Europe United States. 2012 CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) PTP models follows: CAD Consortium 2 (CAD2) pre-test probabilities (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease model taken Tessa Genders et. al. British Medical Journal licensed CC -NC 4.0.

title: Calculate 2012 CAD2 Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp
code: # 40 year old female with typical chest pain, # diabetes but no hypertension, dyslipidemia # and a non-smoker calculate_cad2_2012_clinical_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = 0,     chest_pain = 1,     has_diabetes = 1,     has_hypertension = 0,     has_dyslipidemia = 0,     has_smoking_history = 0  ) #> [1] 0.06691957

what: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test Probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease (CAD) based European Society Cardiology (ESC) 2019 guidelines.

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
code: calculate_esc_2019_ptp(   age,   sex,   have_dyspnea,   chest_pain_type,   output = c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") )

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: age Input numeric value indicate age patient. sex Input characters (female, male) indicate sex patient. female male have_dyspnea Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyspnea symptoms. stands dyspnea symptoms. yes stands dyspnea symptoms. chest_pain_type Input characters (chest pain, typical, atypical, nonanginal) indicate chest pain characteristics patient. chest pain stands patient chest pain. typical stands patient typical chest pain. atypical stands patient atypical chest pain. nonanginal stands patient nonanginal non-specific chest pain. output Input text indicate pre-test probability results expressed Default: c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") grouping means PTP expressed Low, Intermediate High. low PTP less 5 intermediate PTP 5 high PTP 15 numeric means PTP expressed integer probability (0-100). percentage means PTP expressed percentage text (0-100%).

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: integer, percentage category representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based ESC 2019 guidelines. See parameter option `output` information.

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
text: predictive model used create guidelines based patients European countries low cardiovascular disease (CVD) risk. ESC 2019 PTP CAD table follows: ESC 2019 pre-test probabilities obstructive coronary artery disease (CAD) table taken Juhani Knuuti et. al. SpringerLink licensed CC 4.0. patient dyspnea particular chest pain type (typical, atypical, nonanginal), chest pain type take precedence dyspnea

title: Calculate ESC 2019 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2019_ptp
code: # 35 year old female with typical chest pain calculate_esc_2019_ptp(     age = 35,     sex = "female",     have_dyspnea = "no",     chest_pain_type = "typical",     output = "percentage" ) #> [1] "5%"  # 75 year old male with only dyspnea calculate_esc_2019_ptp(     age = 75,     sex = "male",     have_dyspnea = "yes",     chest_pain_type = "no chest pain",     output = "percentage" ) #> [1] "32%"

what: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp
title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test Probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease (CAD) based European Society Cardiology (ESC) 2024 guidelines.

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp
code: calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp(   age,   sex,   chest_pain_type,   have_dyspnea,   have_family_history,   have_smoking_history,   have_dyslipidemia,   have_hypertension,   have_diabetes,   allow_na_symptom_score = TRUE,   max_na_num_of_rf = 0,   output = c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") )

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp
text: age Input numeric value indicate age patient. sex Input characters (female, male) indicate sex patient. female male chest_pain_type Input characters (chest pain, typical, atypical, nonanginal) indicate chest pain characteristics patient. chest pain stands patient chest pain. typical stands patient typical chest pain. atypical stands patient atypical chest pain. nonanginal stands patient nonanginal non-specific chest pain. have_dyspnea Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyspnea symptoms. stands dyspnea symptoms. yes stands dyspnea symptoms. have_family_history Input characters (, yes) indicate patient family history CAD. stands family history CAD. yes stands family history CAD. have_smoking_history Input characters (, yes) indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). stands smoking history (non-smoker). yes stands smoking history (current past smoker). have_dyslipidemia Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyslipidemia. stands dyslipidemia. yes stands dyslipidemia. have_hypertension Input characters (, yes) indicate patient hypertension. stands hypertension. yes stands hypertension. have_diabetes Input characters (, yes) indicate patient diabetes. stands diabetes. yes stands diabetes. allow_na_symptom_score logical evaluating TRUE FALSE indicating whether can allow `chest_pain_type` `have_dyspnea` NA calculating score max_na_num_of_rf Input integer 0 5 indicate maximum number missing risk factors tolerate outputting NA. Default: 0 output Input text indicate pre-test probability results expressed Default: c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") grouping means PTP expressed Low, Intermediate High. low PTP less equal 5 low PTP 6 moderate PTP 15 numeric means PTP expressed integer probability (0-100). percentage means PTP expressed percentage text (0-100%).

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp
text: integer indicating symptom score patient. Default: TRUE integer, percentage category representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based ESC 2024 guidelines. See parameter option `output` information.

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp
code: # 30 female with symptom score of 0 and 0 risk factors calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp(   age = 30,   sex = "female",   chest_pain_type = "no chest pain",   have_dyspnea = "no",   have_family_history = "no",   have_smoking_history = "no",   have_dyslipidemia = "no",   have_hypertension = "no",   have_diabetes = "no",   allow_na_symptom_score = TRUE,   max_na_num_of_rf = 0,   output = "percentage" ) #> [1] "0%"

what: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied
title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied
text: function returns patient's pre-test Probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease (CAD) based European Society Cardiology (ESC) 2024 guidelines.

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied
code: calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied(   age,   sex,   symptom_score,   num_of_rf,   output = c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") )

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied
text: age Input numeric value indicate age patient. sex Input characters (female, male) indicate sex patient. female male symptom_score integer indicating symptom score patient. value can calculated via calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score num_of_rf integer indicating number risk factors patient . value can calculated via calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf Risk factors : family history CAD. smoking history (current past smoker). dyslipidemia. hypertension. diabetes. output Input text indicate pre-test probability results expressed Default: c("grouping", "numeric", "percentage") grouping means PTP expressed Low, Intermediate High. low PTP less equal 5 low PTP 6 moderate PTP 15 numeric means PTP expressed integer probability (0-100). percentage means PTP expressed percentage text (0-100%).

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied
text: integer, percentage category representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based ESC 2024 guidelines. See parameter option `output` information.

title: Calculate ESC 2024 PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied
code: # 30 female with symptom score of 0 and 0 risk factors calculate_esc_2024_fig_4_ptp_simplfied(   age = 30,   sex = "female",   symptom_score = 0,   num_of_rf = 0,   output = "percentage" ) #> [1] "0%"

what: Calculate Number Of Risk Factors (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf
title: Calculate Number Of Risk Factors (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf
text: function used calculate number risk factors patient . used calculate pretest probability coronary artery disease (CAD) based ESC 2024 guidelines.

title: Calculate Number Of Risk Factors (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf
code: calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf(   have_family_history,   have_smoking_history,   have_dyslipidemia,   have_hypertension,   have_diabetes,   max_na = 0 )

title: Calculate Number Of Risk Factors (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf
text: have_family_history Input characters (, yes) indicate patient family history CAD. stands family history CAD. yes stands family history CAD. have_smoking_history Input characters (, yes) indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). stands smoking history (non-smoker). yes stands smoking history (current past smoker). have_dyslipidemia Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyslipidemia. stands dyslipidemia. yes stands dyslipidemia. have_hypertension Input characters (, yes) indicate patient hypertension. stands hypertension. yes stands hypertension. have_diabetes Input characters (, yes) indicate patient diabetes. stands diabetes. yes stands diabetes. max_na Input integer 0 5 indicate maximum number missing risk factors tolerate outputting NA. Default: 0

title: Calculate Number Of Risk Factors (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf
text: integer indicating number risk factors patient . can also `NA` number missing risk factors exceeds `max_na` input value

title: Calculate Number Of Risk Factors (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf
code: calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf(   have_family_history = "yes",   have_smoking_history = "yes",   have_dyslipidemia = "yes",   have_hypertension = "yes",   have_diabetes = "no" ) #> [1] 4  calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf(   have_family_history = "no",   have_smoking_history = "no",   have_dyslipidemia = "no",   have_hypertension = NA,   have_diabetes = "no",   max_na = 0 ) #> [1] NA  calculate_esc_2024_num_of_rf(   have_family_history = "no",   have_smoking_history = "no",   have_dyslipidemia = "no",   have_hypertension = NA,   have_diabetes = "no",   max_na = 1 ) #> [1] 0

title: Calculate Symptom Score (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score
text: function used calculate symptom score patient. used calculate pretest probability coronary artery disease (CAD) based ESC 2024 guidelines.

title: Calculate Symptom Score (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score
code: calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score(   chest_pain_type,   have_dyspnea,   allow_na = TRUE )

title: Calculate Symptom Score (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score
text: chest_pain_type Input characters (chest pain, typical, atypical, nonanginal) indicate chest pain characteristics patient. chest pain stands patient chest pain. typical stands patient typical chest pain. atypical stands patient atypical chest pain. nonanginal stands patient nonanginal non-specific chest pain. have_dyspnea Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyspnea symptoms. stands dyspnea symptoms. yes stands dyspnea symptoms. allow_na logical evaluating TRUE FALSE indicating whether can allow `chest_pain_type` `have_dyspnea` NA calculating score. Default: TRUE

title: Calculate Symptom Score (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score
text: integer indicating symptom score patient. can also `NA` `chest_pain_type` `have_dyspnea` `NA`.

title: Calculate Symptom Score (ESC 2024) — calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score
code: calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score(   chest_pain_type = "nonanginal",   have_dyspnea = "yes",   allow_na = TRUE ) #> [1] 2  calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score(   chest_pain_type = "nonanginal",   have_dyspnea = NA,   allow_na = FALSE ) #> [1] NA  calculate_esc_2024_symptom_score(   chest_pain_type = "nonanginal",   have_dyspnea = NA,   allow_na = TRUE ) #> [1] 1

what: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
title: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease based 2022 Local Assessment Heart (LAH) clinical model.

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
code: calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp(   age,   sex,   chest_pain_type,   have_diabetes,   have_hypertension,   have_dyslipidemia,   have_smoking_history )

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
text: age Input numeric value indicate age patient. sex Input characters (female, male) indicate sex patient. female male chest_pain_type Input characters (typical, atypical, nonanginal) indicate chest pain characteristics patient. typical stands patient typical chest pain. atypical stands patient atypical chest pain. nonanginal stands patient nonanginal non-specific chest pain. have_diabetes Input characters (, yes) indicate patient diabetes. stands diabetes. yes stands diabetes. have_hypertension Input characters (, yes) indicate patient hypertension. stands hypertension. yes stands hypertension. have_dyslipidemia Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyslipidemia. stands dyslipidemia. yes stands dyslipidemia. have_smoking_history Input characters (, yes) indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). stands smoking history (non-smoker). yes stands smoking history (current past smoker).

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based 2022 Local Assessment Heart (LAH) clinical model.

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
text: predictive model based patients mixed Asian cohort within Singapore stable chest pain.

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Clinical PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp
code: # 40 year old female with typical chest pain, # diabetes but no hypertension, dyslipidemia # and a non-smoker calculate_lah_2022_clinical_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = "female",     chest_pain_type = "typical",     have_diabetes = "yes",     have_hypertension = "no",     have_dyslipidemia = "no",     have_smoking_history = "no"  ) #> [1] 0.04711064

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Extended PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp
code: calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp(   age,   sex,   chest_pain_type,   have_diabetes,   have_hypertension,   have_dyslipidemia,   have_smoking_history,   coronary_calcium_score )

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Extended PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp
text: age Input numeric value indicate age patient. sex Input characters (female, male) indicate sex patient. female male chest_pain_type Input characters (typical, atypical, nonanginal) indicate chest pain characteristics patient. typical stands patient typical chest pain. atypical stands patient atypical chest pain. nonanginal stands patient nonanginal non-specific chest pain. have_diabetes Input characters (, yes) indicate patient diabetes. stands diabetes. yes stands diabetes. have_hypertension Input characters (, yes) indicate patient hypertension. stands hypertension. yes stands hypertension. have_dyslipidemia Input characters (, yes) indicate patient dyslipidemia. stands dyslipidemia. yes stands dyslipidemia. have_smoking_history Input characters (, yes) indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). stands smoking history (non-smoker). yes stands smoking history (current past smoker). coronary_calcium_score Input positive numeric indicate total coronary calcium score patient.

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Extended PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based 2022 Local Assessment Heart (LAH) extended model.

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Extended PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp
text: predictive model based patients mixed Asian cohort within Singapore stable chest pain.

title: Calculate 2022 LAH Extended PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp
code: # 40 year old female with typical chest pain, # diabetes but no hypertension, dyslipidemia, # a non-smoker and a coronary calcium score of 0 calculate_lah_2022_extended_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = "female",     chest_pain_type = "typical",     have_diabetes = "yes",     have_hypertension = "no",     have_dyslipidemia = "no",     have_smoking_history = "no",     coronary_calcium_score = 0  ) #> [1] 0.01623848

what: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
title: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
text: function returns symptomatic (chest pain dyspnea) patient's minimal risk score obstructive coronary artery disease based 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score.

title: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
code: calculate_prms_2017_ptp(   age,   sex,   hdl_mg_dl,   is_minority_ethnicity,   has_diabetes,   has_hypertension,   has_dyslipidemia,   has_smoking_history,   has_family_history_of_cad,   has_stress_symptoms = NA )

title: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
text: age Input integer indicate age patient. sex Input integer 0 1 indicate sex patient. 0 stands Female 1 stands Male hdl_mg_dl Input positive numeric value indicate patient's high-density lipoprotein (HDL) \(mg/dL\). is_minority_ethnicity Input integer 0 1 indicate patient racial minority ethnicity (patient non-Hispanic/Latino White). 0 stands patient non-Hispanic/Latino White. 1 stands patient non-Hispanic/Latino White. E.g. Blacks, Asians, etc. has_diabetes Input integer 0 1 indicate patient diabetes. 0 stands diabetes. 1 stands diabetes. has_hypertension Input integer 0 1 indicate patient hypertension. 0 stands hypertension. 1 stands hypertension. has_dyslipidemia Input integer 0 1 indicate patient dyslipidemia. 0 stands dyslipidemia. 1 stands dyslipidemia. has_smoking_history Input integer 0 1 indicate patient smoking history (current past smoker). 0 stands smoking history (non-smoker). 1 stands smoking history (current past smoker). has_family_history_of_cad Input integer 0 1 indicate patient family history CAD. 0 stands family history CAD. 1 stands family history CAD. has_stress_symptoms Input integer 0 1 indicate patient symptoms related physical mental stress. can set NA patient results inconclusive taken stress test exercise treadmill testing, stress echocardiography, stress nuclear imaging. 0 stands symptoms (negative results) related physical mental stress. 1 stands symptoms (positive results) related physical mental stress. NA stands inconclusive results patient taken stress test Default: NA

title: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's minimal risk score obstructive CAD based 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score.

title: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
text: predictive model based CCTA images 4632 patients Prospective Multicenter imaging Study Evaluation Chest Pain (PROMISE) trial.

title: Calculate 2017 PROMISE Minimal-Risk Score for obstructive CAD — calculate_prms_2017_ptp
code: # 50 year old white female with chest pain # a medical history of hypertension, and a # high-density lipoprotein cholesterol level of 70 mg/dL calculate_prms_2017_ptp(     age = 50,     sex = 0,     hdl_mg_dl = 70,     is_minority_ethnicity = 0,     has_diabetes = 0,     has_hypertension = 1,     has_dyslipidemia = 0,     has_smoking_history = 0,     has_family_history_of_cad = 0,     has_stress_symptoms = 0 ) #> [1] 0.710744  # 40 year old non-white male with chest pain # a medical history of diabetes, unknown stress symptoms and a # high-density lipoprotein cholesterol level of 65 mg/dL calculate_prms_2017_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = 1,     hdl_mg_dl = 70,     is_minority_ethnicity = 1,     has_diabetes = 1,     has_hypertension = 0,     has_dyslipidemia = 0,     has_smoking_history = 0,     has_family_history_of_cad = 0,     has_stress_symptoms = NA ) #> [1] 0.6974111

what: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
title: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
text: function returns patient's pre-test probability (PTP) obstructive coronary artery disease based 2020 Winther et. al. basic model (Basic_PTP).

title: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
code: calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp(age, sex, chest_pain)

title: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
text: age Input integer indicate age patient. sex Input integer 0 1 indicate sex patient. 0 stands Female 1 stands Male chest_pain Input integer 1 3 indicate chest pain characteristics patient. 1 stands patient typical chest pain. 2 stands patient atypical chest pain dyspnea. 3 stands patient non-anginal non-specific chest pain.

title: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
text: numeric value representing patient's PTP obstructive CAD based 2020 Winther et. al. basic model (Basic_PTP).

title: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
text: predictive model based > 40000 symptomatic patients 2008 2017 13 hospitals Western Denmark. patients registered Western Denmark Heart Registry.

title: Calculate 2020 Winther Basic PTP for obstructive CAD — calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp
code: # 40 year old Male with typical chest pain calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = 1,     chest_pain = 1 ) #> [1] 0.1430237  # 40 year old Male with non-anginal chest pain calculate_winther_2020_basic_ptp(     age = 40,     sex = 1,     chest_pain = 3 ) #> [1] 0.02218292

title: Round To Nearest Digit — round_to_nearest_digit

title: Round To Nearest Digit — round_to_nearest_digit
